osvSchema.details: Memory corruption in core services when Diag handler receives a command to configure event listeners.

description_data.value: Memory corruption in core services when Diag handler receives a command to configure event listeners.

descriptions.value: Memory corruption in core services when Diag handler receives a command to configure event listeners.
Corrupción de la memoria en los servicios principales cuando Diag handler recibe un comando para configurar los detectores de eventos.
